page.title: 19Facilities in Llanover
page.content: Red Cross:-Once a month. Youth Club:-Held once a week on a Tuesday. Womens Institute:-Once a month. Keep Fit:-Held in members houses weekly. There are no sports clubs of anykind. No other facilities apart from Youth Club are provided for the children. Butcher,s Van:-Once a week. Baker,s Van:-Mon,Tues,Fri. Milk:-Daily. Papers:-Either delivered by milk man or brought out on service bus & placed in estate yard where people collect on their own paper. Groceries:-Mobile shop twice a week. Fish and Chip van:-visits village twice a week.
